_header: I wretch fulfilled of thought and heaviness
_description: Think on me, lady (associated with Charles d’Orléans) — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
I Wrecche fulfillid of þouȝt and hevynesThough þat y
                    wolde allas how myȝt it be…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Wot how it is bitwene vs euery deleOf all my wille my woo ioy
                    and sorowe
